name: Pull-Apart Cheddar Ranch Rolls 🥗
description: Get ready for a flavor explosion with these pull-apart cheddar ranch rolls. Soft, fluffy bread rolls are loaded with melted cheddar cheese and zesty ranch seasoning, making for a savory snack or party appetizer that will disappear in seconds.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease a muffin tin with nonstick spray.
In a large bowl, toss the biscuit pieces with the cheddar, chives, ranch seasoning, and melted butter until well-coated.
Place 3-4 pieces of biscuit into each cup of a the prepared muffin tin.
Bake for 15 minutes, or until the biscuits are golden brown and cooked through.
